txt.en: Collected a beak from a craban ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Saruman will see that his cruelty has been defied in Wildermore

You feel unfriendly eyes on you in this part of the Knolls wherever you go.\n\nCrebain dot the peaks in the western High Knolls -- Saruman's spies, reporting all that goes on back to their corrupted master.

This craban is bigger than the others, and seems to know that you have a message for it to bear to Saruman. These little spies are most perceptive.

You wrap the beaks in a cloth, tie them to the craban, and shoo him off.

Saruman must be taught that all will resist, all will defy him, wherever he imposes his cruel will.
Crebain dot the peaks in the western High Knolls -- Saruman's spies, reporting all that goes on back to their corrupted master.
You have defied Saruman as best you could from this remote location.\n\nHopefully he will be vexed by the affront.
Crebain can be found all over the peaks of the western High Knolls.\n\nYou should defeat crebain in the High Knolls.

Crebain can be found all over the peaks of the western High Knolls, especially near the Lonely Height in the north-west.\n\nYou should defeat crebain in the High Knolls and collect their beaks to send back to Saruman.

The crebain-roost is on the Lonely Height in the north-west High Knolls.\n\nYou should find the biggest craban on the Lonely Height in the High Knolls, and send the beaks you collected with him to Saruman as a message of defiance.
You have defied Saruman as best you could from this remote location.\n\nHopefully he will be vexed by the affront.
Defeat crebain and collect their beaks
Kill spies of Saruman and collect their beaks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find the largest craban to carry the beaks back to Saruman
